articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: Trump says vaping decision coming shortly, hopes flavors can return to market fast
articles.description: U.S. President Donald Trump said on Tuesday that his administration would be unveiling a decision shortly on vaping, and said certain flavors would still come off the market but hopefully then return soon.
articles.content:
PALM BEACH, Fla. (Reuters) - U.S. President Donald Trump said on Tuesday that his administration would be unveiling a decision shortly on vaping, and said certain flavors would still come off the market but hopefully then return soon. 
“We have to protect ou… [+154 chars]

articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: Venus pulls out of Brisbane International, cites 'setback' in training
articles.description: Venus Williams has pulled out of the upcoming Brisbane International after suffering a 'setback' in training, the former world number one said on Wednesday.
articles.content:
(Reuters) - Venus Williams has pulled out of the upcoming Brisbane International after suffering a ‘setback’ in training, the former world number one said on Wednesday. 
Williams, 39, was set to join world number one Ash Barty, Karolina Pliskova and Naomi Os… [+568 chars]

articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: Trump says he thinks North Korea's Kim is a 'man of his word'
articles.description: U.S. President Donald Trump said on Tuesday North Korean leader Kim Jong Un had signed a contract about denuclearization and that he thought the North Korean leader was a "man of his word."
articles.content:
PALM BEACH, Fla. (Reuters) - U.S. President Donald Trump said on Tuesday North Korean leader Kim Jong Un had signed a contract about denuclearization and that he thought the North Korean leader was a “man of his word.” 
Hours after Kim said his country would… [+488 chars]

articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: China's central bank says economic growth resilient despite large pressure
articles.description: China's central bank said on Wednesday that economic growth remains resilient despite relatively large downward pressure and mounting external uncertainty.
articles.content:
BEIJING (Reuters) - China’s central bank said on Wednesday that economic growth remains resilient despite relatively large downward pressure and mounting external uncertainty. 
The People’s Bank of China (PBOC) will work on preventing and defusing financial … [+724 chars]

articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: Taiwan leader rejects China's offer to unify under Hong Kong model
articles.description: Taiwan President Tsai Ing-wen said on Wednesday the island would not accept a "one country, two systems" political formula Beijing has suggested could be used to unify the democratic island, saying such an arrangement had failed in Hong Kong.
